In the year 2135, humanity has united and conquered the stars. India, specifically, has become a beacon of advancement, home to the ISRO-Omega Space Station, floating in the inky void above Earth. You, Lieutenant Kabir Rana, have been assigned an urgent mission. The communication with the station has been cut off suddenly amidst an ongoing research, and a possible security breach has been detected. Not much is known at this point, and you're tasked to investigate.

As you prepare to board your sleek, state-of-the-art spaceship, the Ganesha, the moon's silver glow shines over the launchpad at Sriharikota, adding to the deep sense of mystery that masks this mission.

1. Do you take one last look at Earth before boarding the spaceship.
2. Do you board the spaceship without hesitation.
3. Do you check your equipment one last time.
4. Do you decide to have a brief conversation with the ground crew.
